author: AFP
title: Coronavirus | Passengers from virus-hit ships start leaving Florida
description: 107 passengers and 143 crew reported flu-like symptoms during the voyage, but many have since recovered.
content:
Passengers from a coronavirus-hit cruise ship and its sister vessel, also struck with a handful of cases, started heading home Friday from Florida, after being stranded at sea for days.
The Zaandam, operated by Holland America Line, began its stranger-than-f… [+3299 chars]
